title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Rough Week 1, Ja’Marr Chase Bond, Gameday Swag
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Rough Week 1, Ja’Marr Chase Bond, Gameday Swag
description:
First, (3:00) Colin discusses if Russell Wilson should shoulder the blame for the Broncos dreadful late game clock management in his Seattle return, and if there’s a connection between bad Week 1 QB play and sitting for the entire preseason.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow joins Colin to discuss the lingering effects of a physical Week 1 game against the Steelers (16:00), if a lack of reps following his appendectomy affected his performance, how he’s able to shake off interceptions so easily (20:00), what it’s like facing the elite pass rushers in AFC North on a weekly basis (21:00), if he wants to take preseason reps next year (23:00), how he processed the Super Bowl loss to the Rams (24:00), where he’s improved most from his rookie year (25:00), how much influence he had in the Bengals picking his LSU teammate Ja’Marr Chase (26:00), why Cincinnati has been the perfect fit (30:00), why he’s a cat guy (32:00), Which QB’s are underrated by the media (33:00), the biggest difference between playing in the Super Bowl and regular season games (35:00), why he’s embraced his unique game day swag (35:00), and how he’s preparing for his Week 2 matchup against the Cowboys (38:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
